tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am Pradeep Kumar. I was suffering from gaps between the teeth which makes me panic to smile informing my friends and colleagues two years back. Then I decided to take the treatment to fulfill the gaps by knowing that there is a short way to cure it instead of long process like clip treatment. I have gone through many hospitals over the websites and find ‚ÄúThe Dental Specialists‚Äù finally. I read the reviews, treatment and doctors in The Dental Specialists and came over here with lots of doubts in my mind how the treatment will turn out to be.
But the very first time I visited, I decided to not to go anywhere other than this hospital. The way they treated from the first minute of visit was awesome. They suggested me the different ways which helps to overcome my doubts. Doctors Roopa, Dr. Imran have treated me and suggested me the best options they have. Dr. Dua who has followed up with me right from the beginning, it felt extremely special and important as a patient. And finally Dr. Venkat Garu, head of the institution also came, discussed and assured me to not to worry. Then my treatment started with grafting because my gums and cavities have infected. After successful completion of my grafting and I personally felt the change and got the complete belief on their work. Later on Dr Imran Garu took the responsibility about my ortho which helps to fill the gaps between the teeth. 
He took the seperate and personal care on me because my cavities are so week to respond as early as possible. It takes a little longer but finally done to satisfy my dream to smile....And then to put on the crowns Dr Kamal Garu has taken the responsibility about the crowns and he explained everything with out leaving no stone unturned in my mind.
All the Doctors and Staff have worked really well for my treatment.Thanks to all the people and Doctors at The Dental Specialists especially Dr. Imran, Dr Dua, Dr Kamal and Dr Venkat garu personally. And I decided to ask my sister to visit The Dental Specialists next week as she wants to take the ortho.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recommend Dr. Imran at THE DENTAL SPECIALISTS
It's a very good institution for everyone in need of dental treatment..
I showed my daughter and son both and am very satisfied with the treatments offered.

Do visit for a check up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Heard my tooth problem patiently and suggested the possible options to choose from basis our convenience and making sure that the treatment is going in the right direction

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very clean place and prompt service. Information related to the procedure is given with full clarity. Very helpful service as they also check back after the service is completed for any issues. I'd recommend them any day for any dental service. I've visited Dr. Imran who was very helpful and answered all my questions. I'm very happy with the service as I can see a visible change the service has provided. He is very meticulous and patient. Recommend him for orthodontic procedures anyday.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Clift lip and Cleft palate,Metal Braces Fixing,
review:
The doctors are really friendly and experienced... They give the best solutions for all our problems and are very accommodative... kudos to the team! Dr. Imran and Dr. Narendra have been treating me for my cleft lip case... 
They are precise and punctual also Dr. Sarika is really the best person!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

I am very much satisfied the way he handle the patient * ***** ** ** *** **  *** **** ******* * **** ***** Many special thanks to him üòÑ I will recommend this clinic and Dr. Imran to my family & friends and I thank him very much for my treatment.

I had very good experience. Good care takers of the patient. Good infrastructure. Dr. Imran is very well-experienced. 
A very good atmosphere is maintained in the hospital. I'm very happy to choose this clinic for my dental work.
I recommend this place anytime üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
All the doctors here are very professional.
Dr. Imran understands the patients problem and accordingly gives the treatment. The best thing about the dental specialists is that they have multiple branches which will be convenient in emergency situations where we can visit according to our convenience. 
I will recommend this place and team of doctors anytime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Dental Specialists is an Amazing Dental clinic! I am undergoing orthodontic treatment with Dr. Imran here. The Doctors are experts! Support staff are polite and courteous and ready to help at any time of the day. I have been undergoing treatment for the past 8 months and I am having an amazing experience. In case we forget to schedule an appointment, staff will reach out to us and ensure we are not delaying treatment. I would recommend The Dental Specialists to my friends and colleagues.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Very professional and gentle. The staff is very accommodating and the office is very stunning and clean .This is the happiest dental clinic I've ever experienced. I love that they have a discussion with you, to explain why & how a procedure is done. Not leaving just you in the dark about your own health... Love them!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I found this place using Google and decided to go ahead with this clinic. It has been a pleasant experience working with Dr. Imran. Every doubt and nuance is always properly addressed and in the rare case a mistake is made like the bands coming off , it is immediately addressed. Definitely would recommend to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am loving the experience here so far with Dr. Imran. I found him brilliant and genuine and true to his profession. The clinic is very hygienic and management is very cooperative and kind. Even after your appointment is done, you are followed up by doctors to know everything went well the next day. Two thumbs up! Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was referred here by one of my cousins and visited here for my orthodontic treatment. I have my invisaligners treatment going on with Dr. Imran and I am already very happy with it. I find him available as soon as I reach the clinic and very comfortable with the service .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Imran is a great orthodontist, my teeth had significant gaps and he recommended invisible braces. The first 6 months he walked me through the process as I did regular check ups every two weeks. The difference before and after has been absolutely amazing. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got my sister Vinutha Kalal here for her orthodontic treatment an year back with Dr. Imran. I was referred here by my neighbors who got treated here as well. I am immensely satisfied with Dr Imran‚Äôs work. And the clinic only improved with its services and patient‚Äôs care in this one year. I would definitely recommend them to others now that I have their referral card. Thank you to the team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am Korean students guardian Lee, Shin, Park, Choi and Kim .. today I happened to visit this clinic for my own check up and now I know why these guys love this place. Their treatment is going on with Dr. Imran, the treatment is going on just as desired.. The place is Fully hygienic, friendly doctors and staff and the place is perfect looking. Highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had good experience with Dr. Imran as I visited for having braces. He is very patient and makes us comfortable during whole process of putting braces. I would recommend him to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had to get a new retainer and Dr.Imran was the one who attended my issue. Dr. is very patient and understands his patients very well. *** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* **** ***** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I am extremely thankful to Dr imran for his service Good experience.The treatment was taken proper care so far. I am very satisfied from my treatment.Nice place. Highly recommended.

I am very happy with Dr. Imran's treatment. It had been quite a few years since i was looking for a good orthodontist and I could finally meet him!
I'm extremely thankful to him.
